Sequence Information.Source: Gray short-tailed opossum,Monodelphis domestica, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (41.4%) tofish dicentracin-like peptide.Activity: Active against E. coli ATCC25922 (MIC 20 uM), S. aureus ATCC29213 or MRSA (MIC 10 uM), S. pyogenes ATCC19615 (MIC 20 uM), S. agalactiae ATCC 12386 (MIC 20 uM), S. dysgalactiae (MIC 20 uM), S. lutetiensis (MIC 20 uM), S. equi (MIC 20 uM), S. salivarius (MIC 10 uM), fungi C. parapsilosis ATCC22019 (MIC 10 uM), and C. krusei ATCC6258 (MIC 20 uM).MOA: Have an effect on membranes. Updated 7/2023
Literature Information.Author: Peel E, Cheng Y, Djordjevic JT, Kuhn M, Sorrell T, Belov K.2017
Literature Information.Title: Marsupial and monotreme cathelicidins display antimicrobial activity, including against methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
